title: Poland - Business Visa
visa_fee: 9,800 BDT (Visa Fee & Service Charge) + ~10,000 BDT (Tourist Voucher) + Hotel Confirmation extra

details.title: Eligibility
items: Valid Bangladeshi passport (valid for at least 6 months beyond visa expiry)
Completed and signed Poland visa application form and tourist questionnaire
Clear purpose of travel such as tourism or business
Tourist voucher from a certified Polish travel agency (not a hotel booking)
Confirmed round-trip air ticket and paid hotel booking
Bank statement showing sufficient financial means
Employment certificate stating wages over past month/6 months/year
Proof of property ownership and family structure in Bangladesh
All documents must be submitted at least 30 days before intended travel

details.title: Required Documents
items: Duly filled visa application form (typed or handwritten legibly)
One passport-size color photograph (3.5 x 4.5 cm), glued to the form
Tourist questionnaire (downloadable from embassy website)
Tourist voucher from licensed travel agent with agent name and reference number
Valid passport and photocopy of bio pages (valid for at least 6 months after visa expiry)
Confirmed hotel accommodation receipt
Confirmed round-trip flight booking
Payment confirmation for visa fee
Personal bank statement
Employer's salary statement (monthly, half-yearly, or yearly)
Documents proving property ownership in Bangladesh
Certificate outlining applicant's family structure

note: All expenditures related to visa processing are strictly non-refundable. Visa information and associated charges are subject to change at any time without prior notice. We provide assistance only and do not guarantee the issuance of visas. This information sheet has been prepared by us and may include additional details beyond the embassy's requirements.
